design.layout: full-width with centered hero and card-grid product showcase

typography.headingStyle: Sans-serif, bold, dark navy (1E1B4B), large size for main nav items and product names
typography.bodyStyle: Sans-serif, regular weight, dark navy, smaller for descriptions and supporting text
typography.dataStyle: Feature descriptions in sentence case, action text in uppercase for buttons

components.description: Purple banner at top with announcement text and linked headline
components.notable: High contrast color draw attention to product launch news

components.description: Horizontal nav with Explore, Build, Learn dropdowns plus social icons
components.notable: Clean, minimal design with social media integration on right

components.description: Large 3D rendered abstract shape with blue/white gradient
components.notable: Modern, clean 3D aesthetic that conveys technology and innovation

components.description: Four equal-width cards describing EigenAI, EigenCompute, EigenDA, EigenLayer
components.notable: Vertical dividers between cards create distinct sections; consistent button styling

components.description: Dark background with logo, links organized in columns, copyright
components.notable: Simple layout with navigational links and legal links separated

design.visualHierarchy: Hero image dominates center, product cards arranged horizontally below create secondary focus, footer grounds page
innovativeElements: 3D rendered product image with glossy, modern aesthetic
Vertical dividers between product cards create visual separation without hard borders

flow.userIntent: Discover Eigen Cloud products and services, understand what each product does, take action to try/explore
exitPoints: Footer links to docs, foundation, careers, press
Social media icons (Twitter, Discord, GitHub, YouTube)

interactiveElements.action: Each card has a dedicated CTA button to explore that product
Explore, Build, Learn dropdowns likely reveal submenu items
Navigate to documentation, legal pages, career pages, external resources

flow.informationArchitecture: Top-level nav for primary sections; hero section orients user to brand; product grid presents four distinct offerings with descriptions and individual CTAs; footer provides secondary navigation and legal compliance

copy.headline: EigenCloud

microcopy.text: EigenCompute & EigenAI are in Mainnet Alpha
microcopy.purpose: Signal product maturity status to users
Concisely describe the product's core capability

microcopy.text: Deterministic AI with drop-in OpenAI API compatibility
microcopy.purpose: Explain technical benefit and integration ease
Core value prop in simple terms

microcopy.text: Run any code in containers with cryptographic proof of execution

dataFormatting: Product names in CamelCase with color coding
trustSignals: Specific technical capabilities mentioned (cryptographic proof, verifiable workloads)
